title: care to suggest a typeface?
content:
for the wordmark for a [sustainable and organic clothing](http://web.archive.org/web/20120307033502/http:/www.wholesum.com/) line named "wholesum, every bit counts"

thank you type masters!

E
author: typokallos

comments.content: Balloon extra bold or Las Vegas Castaway

That FF Cocon isn't bad, but I would just tighten the spacing a bit and drop the puzzle piece.

[Paddington](http://web.archive.org/web/20120307033502/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/paddington/?sample_text=wholesum&sample_size=74)  
 [Maiandra](http://web.archive.org/web/20120307033502/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/maiandra_gd_black_italic/?sample_text=wholesum&sample_size=74)  
 [Sauna](http://web.archive.org/web/20120307033502/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/underware/sauna_swash_bold_italic/?sample_text=wholesum&sample_size=74)  
 [Eidetic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120307033502/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/emigre/eidetic_neo_omni/?sample_text=whoLesum&sample_size=60)
thanks, i specially like maiandra! anything on the adobe fontfolio or linotype collection that resembles it?
